credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
dimensions:
Overall: 4 11/16 in. (11.9 cm)
rim: 3 9/16 in. (9 cm)
Base: 1 5/16 in. (3.4 cm)
title: Conical Beaker
description: Very thin, natural bluish-green transparent glass. Tall conical form with flaring tooled rim. Small, round base widening slightly. Deeply concave. Pontil-mark. Vessel is slightly lopsided, with somewhat irregular sides. Some incrustation and light iridesecent film interior and exterior.
